job_description:
Job Title:Undergraduate Intern (12 Months) - Software EngineeringAbout Skyhigh Security:Skyhigh Security is a dynamic, fast-paced, cloud company that is a leader in the security industry. Our mission is to protect the world’s data, and because of this, we live and breathe security. We value learning at our core, underpinned by openness and transparency.Since 2011, organizations have trusted us to provide them with a complete, market-leading security platform built on a modern cloud stack. Our industry-leading suite of products radically simplifies data security through easy-to-use, cloud-based, Zero Trust solutions that are managed in a single dashboard, powered by hundreds of employees across the world. With offices in Santa Clara, Aylesbury, Paderborn, Bengaluru, Sydney, Tokyo and more, our employees are the heart and soul of our company.Skyhigh Security Is more than a company; here, when you invest your career with us, we commit to investing in you. We embrace a hybrid work model, creating the flexibility and freedom you need from your work environment to reach your potential. From our employee recognition program, to our ‘Blast Talks' learning series, and team celebrations (we love to have fun!), we strive to be an interactive and engaging place where you can be your authentic self.We are on these too! Follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter@SkyhighSecurity.Role Overview:We've an exciting hands-on year-long paid internship working within the Skyhigh Security Data Protection team where you'll learn and contribute to the team as they produce next generation cloud technology to help secure business data from accidental or malicious loss.About the role:Our team develops software that secures against data breaches that can damage organizations, ruin reputations and result in the leakage of personal information. You'll join us in the further development of cloud services that enable our customers to protect their sensitive content. You'll learn new skills and technologies within a supportive agile development team. Your colleagues will work with you, guiding you so that you contribute directly to all aspects of software development, allowing you to build and enhance skills in design, coding, test automation, infrastructure maintenance and support for the production software. Roles exist in teams developing our next generation user interfaces as well as in developing cloud content scanning technologies depending on your skills and interests.About you:Good programming skills using an object-oriented programming language, e.g. Java or C++An ability to solve problems in an efficient mannerAn interest and enthusiasm for working with new technologiesExcellent verbal and written English skillsAn ability to communicate ideas and describe your work using visual aids where appropriateStudying Computer Science, or similar technical discipline that includes significant computer programming contentWorking towards a Bachelor’s or Master’s DegreeProjected grade of 2.1 or aboveEligible to work in the UK



        
            Show more
          

          



        
            Show less

key_requirements: Interest and enthusiasm for working with new technologies
Develop cloud services for data protection
Focus on next generation user interfaces AND/OR cloud content scanning technologies
job_analysis.selected_projects_reasoning:
Selected 'DocuCare AI' because it directly addresses 'cloud services', 'data protection' (medical documents), 'new technologies' (Gemini, Claude, RAG, vector embeddings), and 'next-generation user interfaces' (Next.js, React). Its focus on AI for data extraction and summarization aligns well with potential 'cloud content scanning technologies'.
'Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)' was chosen for its demonstration of robust backend engineering, 'efficient' problem-solving (matching engine, asynchronous pipelines), data management (PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy), and scalability, all crucial for 'developing cloud services'. It also highlights a modern React frontend.
'FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System' from the generic CV was retained as it showcases advanced Generative AI skills (Stable Diffusion, LoRA) and Python optimization, which demonstrates proficiency in 'new technologies' and could be highly relevant for complex 'cloud content scanning' or data processing tasks, especially given the Master's in AI.

tailored_cv.professional_summary: Enthusiastic and results-driven Master's student in Artificial Intelligence with strong software engineering fundamentals, seeking to apply robust programming skills (Java, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript) in developing secure, cloud-based solutions. Proven ability to efficiently solve complex problems and rapidly adopt new technologies. Passionate about data protection and building next-generation systems, with experience in full-stack development, AI-driven data processing, and agile methodologies. Eager to contribute to a dynamic cloud security environment and enhance skills in design, coding, and test automation.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

other_degrees.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
other_degrees.university: Vivekanand Education Society’s Institute of Technology, Mumbai, India

experience.title: Salesforce Administrator Intern
experience.description: Streamlined CRM processes and enhanced data accuracy through Salesforce administration and automation.
achievements: Automated Salesforce workflows and validation rules, improving CRM data accuracy by 20% and operational efficiency.
Designed and implemented travel management modules with intuitive dashboards for improved reporting and visibility.
Collaborated cross-functionally to translate complex business requirements into scalable and secure Salesforce configurations.

experience.title: Technology Foundations Virtual Experience
experience.description: Participated in an end-to-end Agile Software Development Life Cycle simulation with a focus on DevOps and automation.
achievements: Executed an end-to-end Agile SDLC simulation, gaining practical experience with DevOps and automation tools.
Debugged and optimised Python scripts, enhancing runtime efficiency by 30% through targeted code improvements.
Presented complex algorithmic solutions with clear flow diagrams, significantly improving technical communication.

projects.title: DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered web application for medical document management, leveraging AI for OCR, data extraction, and intelligent querying.
achievements: Re-architected backend infrastructure to a 100% free-tier compatible stack using Supabase, optimizing cloud resource utilization.
Engineered a server-side AI pipeline using Google Gemini 1.5 Flash for advanced OCR and precise medical data extraction from documents.
Implemented an intelligent RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) chat system utilizing vector embeddings for querying health records securely.
Built a robust frontend with Next.js 14 App Router and Server Actions for secure, high-performance data fetching and interactive user experience.

projects.title: Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)
projects.description: Architected a comprehensive job aggregation and matching platform for students, automating local search based on availability and skills.
achievements: Designed and implemented a specific matching engine using weighted vectors to optimize job recommendations based on location, schedule, and skill alignment.
Engineered asynchronous background worker pipelines with Celery and Redis, enabling efficient scraping of external job boards without impacting real-time performance.
Developed a normalized PostgreSQL schema with SQLAlchemy ORM for robust data modeling and managing complex relationships between jobs, students, and skills.
Created a high-performance, reactive frontend using React 19 and React Hook Form, enhancing user interaction and data presentation.

projects.title: FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System
projects.description: Built a generative AI model for realistic text-to-image creation, demonstrating advanced machine learning capabilities.
achievements: Developed a generative AI model using Stable Diffusion and LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) for efficient and high-quality text-to-image generation.
Optimised GPU training on an RTX 3050, achieving a 25% reduction in memory usage and improved model performance.
Integrated real-time data pipelines to enhance interactive user experience and model responsiveness during generation tasks.
